# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty shape structure.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Initializing a graph shape

- **init(rank:shape:)**: Creates a shape structure with the specified rank and dimensions.

items.description: Creates a shape structure with the specified rank and dimensions.
items.name: init(rank:shape:)
